summary: When it's time to leave, walk away from people and situations in your life with a smile on your face
title: Don't Burn Bridges

summary: Lots of exciting new features have been landing in CSS recently, and it can be tough trying to figure out if they’re safe to use or not.  We might know that a feature is available for 92% of users, but is that sufficient.  Where do we draw the line...
title: A Framework for Evaluating Browser Support

summary:
As a complement to the StatusBear Shortcut for the Bear Micro Blog (or any blog for that matter), here's a shortcut that may come in handy when posting photos. 
When viewing a picture in your camera roll that you want to post on your blog, tap "PhotoBear" in the share sheet.  This will grab the time and date, camera model, and location, which all will be added to your clipboard...
title: Photo Shortcut for Blogging

summary:
This is from 404 Media:
The Graykey, a phone unlocking and forensics tool that is used by law enforcement around the world, is only able to retrieve partial data from all modern iPhones that run iOS 18 or iOS 18. 0. 1, which are two recently released versions of Apple’s mobile operating system, according to documents describing the tool’s capabilities in granular detail obtained by 404 Media...
title: What Graykey Can and Can’t Unlock
